description:
Create, Review and Edit PDF Documents on Windows, Mac, and Linux.

## [Features](https://www.qoppa.com/pdfstudio/features/)

- Reviewing and Annotating
- Creating and Assembling Documents
- Working with PDF Forms
- Editing Content Pro
- Conversion and PDF Sub-Formats
- Advanced User Interface
- Adding Security to PDF Documents
- Batch Functions Pro
- Advanced functions (Merge, Split, OCR, Rasterize) & more…Pro

![screenshot](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chtof/chocolatey-packages/automatic/pdfstudio/screenshot.png)
